argument.name: direction
argument.description: What direction to navigate. Value can be *[js:first]*, *[js:last]*, *[js:next]*, or *[js:prev]*.

page.description: Selects the specified item in the ViewBox. direction can be: first, last, next, prev
page.example: var vbObj = {dialog.object}.getControl('MYVIEWBOX1'); //get pointer to the ViewBox vbObj.navigate('next');
